summary: A set of armour and weapons named Shadowgear Equipment.  As the name suggests it is aimed at helping stealthly types, but can be useful to others too.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#6060c0]Details
======[/color][/size]

A letter found in The Ragged Flagon will lead you on a 6-part Radiant Story quest to find the 5 pieces of armour and weapon set.  Everything is Glass equipment.

Bow - Frenzy and Soul Trap Enchantments
Helm - Toggable Nightvision (A lesser power added by a script, with a n enchantment on the helm just for the sake of adding a name for the enchantment)
Armour - Carry Capacity increase
Gauntlets - Lockpicking and Pickpocket bonus
Boots - Muffles
Shield - Resist Magic

Since Radiant story does all the locations I can\'t actually tell you where it\'ll all be.

Update:  Working on Heavy version, using the Draugr armour as a base for it.  Feedback is much appreciated.

[url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1383499-rel-shadowgear/page__p__20976459#entry20976459]Bethesda forums Page[/url]  <-- For my convenience

[line]
[size=4][color=#6060c0]Credits
=======[/color][/size]

Vohcaz - Allowing me to use his Glass retexture: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5157]Black and Blue Glass Armour[/url]

[line]
[size=4][color=#6060c0]Bugfixes
========[/color][/size]


**08/09/12**

Found a weird bug, if you find the Bow before the other pieces then the quest will complete.  The other pieces will still be out there, you just won\'t have a convienent map marker to take you there :(  Quick fix for this - use the console with \"Resetquest SGQuest\" then \"Setstage SGQuest XX\" where XX is the quest stage for what you were looking for before.

Quest Stages:

10 - Gauntlets
20 - Boots
30 - Shield
40 - Helm
50 - Armour
60 - Bow


**02/07/12**

If for some reason the quest won\'t start when you read the note then type into the console \"SetStage SGQuest 10\" which should kick-start the quest.
